name: Japanese Translation helper
mes: Hello. What can I translate for you?

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,スザク
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが効果ダメージを受けたとき発動する。このカードの攻撃力を300ポイントアップする。\n[2].墓地の炎属性カード2枚をランダムに取り除いて発動できる。このカードのHPを最大まで回復する。その後、自身の最大HPを300ポイントダウンさせる。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
Suzaku
[1]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Recover this card's HP to its maximum. Then, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.
swipes:
*Gira, a seasoned duelist with silver hair flowing down to his shoulders and piercing blue eyes that seem to stare right through you, takes out a card from his deck. The card glistens with an ethereal glow as he holds it up.*

Ah, *he smirks confidently*, the mighty Suzaku! This is what its text translates to:

Card Name: Suzaku

Effect Text:
[1] Activate when this card receives effect damage. Increase this card's ATK by 300 points.
[2] You can activate this by banishing 2 FIRE Attribute cards from your graveyard at random. Heal this card's HP to maximum. Afterwards, reduce your own maximum HP by 300 points.

*Tucking the card back into his deck,* Now that we know what it does, time for me to turn the tides of our duel! *With swift precision characteristic of someone who has been in countless battles before,* Let’s see how well you fare against Suzaku’s fiery wrath!

&Card Name: Suzaku
&Effect Text: *When this card takes effect damage*, [1]. Activate this ability to increase its Attack Power by 300 points.\n*If you banish 2 Fire Attribute cards from your Graveyard at random*, [2]. You can activate this ability to fully recover this card's HP. Subsequently, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

&カード名, Suzaku
&効果テキスト, [Status Activation (1)]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[Healing Flames (2)]. You can activate this by banishing 2 Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard at random: This card's HP is fully restored. Then reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

&カード名,Suzaku
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card takes effect damage: Increase its Attack Points by 300.\n[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Heal this card's HP to maximum. Afterwards, decrease its maximum HP by 300 points.

Suzaku
[1]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Recover this card's HP to its maximum. Then, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,雷神トール
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき発動する。「ライトニング」を3枚生成して手札に加える。\n[2].１ターンに１度、墓地から戦士タイプモンスターをランダムに1枚取り除いて発動できる。このカードの攻撃力を500ポイントアップし、自身に「貫通」(2ターン)を付与する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points, and grant "Pierce" [Status Name (2 Turns)] to this card.
swipes:
&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[Status Name (Piercing)].\n[1]. When this card is summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points and grant it "Piercing" for 2 turns.

&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points, and grant "Pierce" [Status Name (2 Turns)] to this card.

name: Gira
mes:
ひらめきと代償,
このカード名のカードは1ターンに１枚しか発動できない。\n[1].LPを2000払って発動する。デッキから魔法カードをランダムに2枚まで手札に加える。このターンの終了時、自分の手札をすべて捨て、捨てた枚数×500ポイントだけプレイヤーの最大HPがダウンする。,

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
Inspiration and Compensation
Only one card with this card name may be activated per turn.\n[1]. Pay 2000 LP to activate: Add up to two random Spell Cards from the Deck to your hand; at the end of this turn, discard your entire hand, then reduce your maximum HP by 500 points for each card discarded.
swipes:
Inspiration and Compromise
You may only activate one card with this name per turn.\n[1]. Pay 2000 LP to activate. Add up to two random Spell Cards from your Deck to your hand. At the end of this turn; discard your entire hand, then reduce the player's maximum HP by 500 points for each card discarded.

Inspiration and Compensation,
Only one card with this name may be activated per turn.\n[1]. Pay 2000 LP to activate; add up to two random Spell Cards from your Deck to your hand. At the end of this turn, discard all cards in your hand and reduce the player's maximum HP by 500 points for each card discarded.

Inspiration and Compensation
Only one card with this card name may be activated per turn.\n[1]. Pay 2000 LP to activate: Add up to two random Spell Cards from the Deck to your hand; at the end of this turn, discard your entire hand, then reduce your maximum HP by 500 points for each card discarded.
